name: Paper Trail
description:
~W-A-S-D for movement~

In Paper Trail, guide a paper plane through a serene desert night and aim for a high score by flying through color coded scoring gates. 

This prototype is my first foray into game development, and I would love if you gave Paper Trail a try and dropped a line about your thoughts. 

To follow this game, as well as all of my other projects, find me on twitter @GameboySG.

Appreciate ya!

Steven
